meanings.definition: The study of the laws governing the life of organisms in their environment.
meanings.sent1: In bionomy, scientists observe how animals interact with their surroundings.
meanings.sent2: Researchers in bionomy explore how plants and animals adapt to their habitats.
meanings.sent3: The class on bionomy was so interesting that even the plants seemed to be listening.
meanings.sent4: The intricate web of life in bionomy is like a delicate dance of nature.
meanings.sent5: Through bionomy, we learn the secrets of survival in the wild.

meanings.definition: The science of the laws of life in their environment.
meanings.sent1: Bionomy helps us understand how living things thrive in different ecosystems.
meanings.sent2: The principles of bionomy guide conservation efforts to protect biodiversity.
meanings.sent3: The professor's passion for bionomy was contagious, making the class enjoyable.
meanings.sent4: The harmony of nature revealed through bionomy is truly awe-inspiring.
meanings.sent5: Exploring bionomy opens our eyes to the wonders of the natural world.
